fields.summary: Android: String.value error log during startup

comments.body: Nasty error, still present in SDK 8+. It may be an [Emulator bug|https://stackoverflow.com/questions/50680582/the-stringvalue-field-is-not-present-on-android-versions-6-0] but it would be great to be confirmed.
